alert.note: Alert for Grimes; Montgomery; Washington (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 9:02PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Grimes, east central Washington, southwestern Montgomery, northeastern Waller and northwestern Harris Counties through 945 PM CDT... At 902 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles east of Anderson to near Cut And Shoot. Movement was southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Southwestern Conroe, Tomball, Pinehurst, The Woodlands, Greater Greenspoint, Panorama Village, Magnolia, Montgomery, Stagecoach, Todd Mission, The Woodlands Pavillion, Hooks Airport, Lake Conroe Dam, Willowbrook, Acres Home, Greater Inwood, Hidden Valley, Dobbin, Dacus and Plantersville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for southeastern Texas.
